property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the BevelAndEmbossSetting (a TransparencySetting, StrokeTransparencySetting, FillTransparencySetting or ContentTransparencySetting).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: applied
property.shortdesc: If true, the bevel or emboss effect is applied.

property.name: style
property.shortdesc: The style of bevel or emboss.

property.name: technique
property.shortdesc: The edging technique of the bevel or emboss.

property.name: depth
property.shortdesc: The depth of the bevel or emboss (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 1000)

property.name: direction
property.shortdesc: The direction of the bevel or emboss.

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: The size of the bevel or emboss.

property.name: soften
property.shortdesc: The amount (in pixels) of softening.

property.name: angle
property.shortdesc: The angle of the light source. (Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: altitude
property.shortdesc: The altitude of the light source. (Range: 0 to 90)

property.name: useGlobalLight
property.shortdesc: If true, the global light source is used.

property.name: highlightColor
property.shortdesc: The color applied to the highlight portion of the effect, specified as a swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), a color library color, a hex value, or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127; for HSB, specify three colors in the format [H,S,B], with H in the range 0 to 360 and S and B as percentages in the range 0 to 100.

property.name: highlightBlendMode
property.shortdesc: The blending mode for the highlight portion of the effect.

property.name: highlightOpacity
property.shortdesc: The opacity of the highlight portion of the effect (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: shadowColor
property.shortdesc: The color applied to the shadow portion of the effect, specified as a swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), a color library color, a hex value, or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127; for HSB, specify three colors in the format [H,S,B], with H in the range 0 to 360 and S and B as percentages in the range 0 to 100.

property.name: shadowBlendMode
property.shortdesc: The blending mode for the shadow portion of the effect.

property.name: shadowOpacity
property.shortdesc: The opacity of the shadow portion of the effect (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the BevelAndEmbossSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
